column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''20''' is the twentieth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Source List of the Elvish Languages Found in [[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]" — [[Taum Santoski]].
* "Words and Devices: The Quick and the Dead" (column) — [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]].

* "Transitions in Translations" (column)<ref>Contents of the column: "How Many ''Meilen'' are in a ''Lár''?"; "Review: The Russian Lord of the Rings", by [[David Doughan]]; "More Russian Translation Notes", by David Doughan.</ref> — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
